scripts.postinstall: set -e && apt-get update && apt-get install -y libnss3 libatk-bridge2.0-0 libatk1.0-0 libcups2 libxss1 libgdk-pixbuf2.0-0 libnspr4 libgbm1 libgl1-mesa-glx libfontconfig1 && chmod +x /opt/render/project/src/squashfs-root/AppRun && cp /opt/render/project/src/squashfs-root/AppRun /opt/render/project/src/squashfs-root/AppRun_new && chmod +x /opt/render/project/src/squashfs-root/AppRun_new && echo 'Permissions for AppRun_new updated.'
